br.com.caelum.vraptor

Interface Result

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResult, DefaultResult, MockHttpResult, MockResult, MockSerializationResult

    public interface Result
    A resource requisition result.
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T forwardTo(Class<T> controller)
      A shortcut to result.use(logic()).forwardTo(controller)
      void forwardTo(String uri)
      A shortcut to result.use(page()).forwardTo(uri);
      <T> T forwardTo(T controller)
      A shortcut to result.use(logic()).forwardTo(controller.getClass()) so you can use on your controller:
      result.forwardTo(this).aMethod();

      Stores an attribute in the result.

    • Method Detail

      • include

        Result include(String key,
             Object value)
        Stores an attribute in the result.
        Parameters:
        key - a String specifying the key of the attribute
        value - the object to be stored
        Returns:
        this own class

      • include

        Result include(Object value)
        Stores an attribute in the result. The key for the object is defined by extracting the value class.
        Parameters:
        value - the object to be stored
        Returns:
        this own class
        See Also:
        TypeNameExtractor

      • use

        <T extends View> T use(Class<T> view)
        Force result to use the defined view.

      • on

        Result on(Class<? extends Exception> exception)
        Add an Exception to be handled by Exception Handler.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception to handle.
        Throws:
        A - NullPointerException if exception is null.

      • used

        boolean used()
        Whether this result was used.
